did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
did.physdesc: This collection is 0.1 cubic feet and is a one-folder manuscript.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Barnett, James Inventory, 1811, Ms2002-022, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one list of free Negroes and Mulattoes, compiled by James Barnett, district commissioner of revenue, Montgomery County, Virginia. The list includes places of residence of the free persons as well as a brief job description for each. The list divides Mulattoes from Negroes and while the Mulattoes consist of three families totaling fifteen persons, there are only two Negroes, one of whom is John Hope, father of one of the Mulatto families.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This manuscript contains only one document and is located within a collection of one-folder manuscripts. These manuscripts are organized in numerical order according to their manuscript number.
